texts.help_h: This bot will track all transactions from your Ethereum wallet and notify you immediately! Available blockchains: Ethereum, Tron Available tokens: USDT, USDC
texts.wallets_h: Tracked Wallets: (× - remove wallet from list)
texts.addwallet_address: Send the wallet address (erc20 or trc20 only)
texts.addwallet_name: Send the name of the wallet or skip this step
texts.new_chat_added: Hello, this bot will send notifications of all transactions on {}'s wallets
